text: Getting real. Sophia Bush joined Anna Faris ’ “ Unqualified ” podcast to talk all things women empowerment and relationships from the past. The actress, who ’ s set to star in CBS ’ upcoming drama Surveillance, opened up about her past romances and what she ’ s learned over the years. “ When I look back at the way I have operated – also by the way as a serial monogamist for a long time, and stuck in relationships that were not good for me – I now look back and go, ‘ Oh, it ’ s not my fault, it ’ s not their fault. ’ Even the guys who f – ked up so bad — and I ’ ve had a handful, ” Bush, 36, revealed to Faris in the interview published on Tuesday, December 4. “ What I
